title: How to Ollie on a Tech Deck Using Three Fingers

steps.headline: Place your index finger right behind the front screws.
Place your middle finger right behind the Tech Deck logo.
Place your ring finger on the back of the board.
Smack down the tail of the board and at the same time try to move the board forward while keeping your fingers on the board.
Land the board while still coming forward.
Ride away looking cool while your friends stare in awe.

tyn: Tech deck (or just any other fingerboard works)
text: Place your index finger right behind the front screws.  Place your middle finger right behind the Tech Deck logo.  Place your ring finger on the back of the board.  Smack down the tail of the board and at the same time try to move the board forward while keeping your fingers on the board.  Land the board while still coming forward.  Ride away looking cool while your friends stare in awe.
sentences: Place your index finger right behind the front screws.
Place your middle finger right behind the Tech Deck logo.
Place your ring finger on the back of the board.
Smack down the tail of the board and at the same time try to move the board forward while keeping your fingers on the board.
Land the board while still coming forward.
Ride away looking cool while your friends stare in awe.
